about_the_game:
Treasure, mazes, and trapdoors... Oh my! What else could your labyrinth possibly need? Music that matches, of course!

This Dungeon pack contains ten different themes that will make your mazes come alive... Or feel dead. It's up to you! From heaven to hell, this song pack has what you need!

Tracklist:

1 - Dungeon001
2 - Dungeon002
3 - Dungeon003
4 - Dungeon004
5 - Dungeon005
6 - Dungeon006
7 - Dungeon007
8 - Dungeon008
9 - Dungeon009
10 - Dungeon010

Features:

  • 10 different dungeon themes. Make your caves sound deserted, or your enemy bases fully loaded.
  • Each song was carefully crafted for RPG Maker, and loops seamlessly in the program.
  • OGG and .M4A formats
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - G3: Dungeons

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - G3: Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Treasure, mazes, and trapdoors... Oh my! What else could your labyrinth possibly need? Music that matches, of course!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
